message: Site I was introduced to moments ago.  Check it out.  Basically it lets you create "If/Then" statements for social media functions.  Like, "If I'm tagged on Facebook, post it on Twitter" or "If someone likes one of my YouTube videos, send me a text."
i've been tooling with it for a little while
its pretty fun if you're a socialite and like to keep track of stuff without using an aggregate client. currently using one of the recipes to nab tagged photos of me from fb and stick them in dropbox
